H0.text: According to Jewish tradition, whose chair is set ready at each passover meal in case he reappears to herald the coming of the Messiah. Elijah's brother

H1.text: According to Jewish tradition, whose chair is set ready at each passover meal in case he reappears to herald the coming of the Messiah. King David

H2.text: According to Jewish tradition, whose chair is set ready at each passover meal in case he reappears to herald the coming of the Messiah. Moses

H3.text: According to Jewish tradition, whose chair is set ready at each passover meal in case he reappears to herald the coming of the Messiah. Elya
